column5: Wandering the isle of a local fishing store for the 3 time in as many weeks looking for something I really didn’t need it dawned on me that I may have a problem Newest post is up.  My effort at some satire during this painful shoulder season lol https://www.northernjacks.com/post/top-5-signs-you-may-have-a-fishing-problem Cheers Andrew
Good piece of writing Andrew.  Makes me chuckle while adding up my numbers. I believe I am a 4 !   I think I am going out tomorrow to wet a line.  Cheers
Thanks - glad you enjoyed! I am a solid 5 but going to make a concentrated effort this winter to enjoy some ice fishing Cheers Andrew
